template.name: vbase
vsearch
vcrud
template.value:
<template>
    <el-row style="height:100%">
        <mars-crud
            ref="crud"
            :indexRow="listConfig.indexRow"
            :canDrag="listConfig.canDrag"
            :clickIndex="listConfig.clickIndex"
            :selectionRow="listConfig.selectionRow"
            :show-summary="listConfig.showSummary"
            :height="listConfig.height"
            :data="listConfig.listData"
            :toolbars="listConfig.toolbars"
            :search-form="listConfig.searchForm"
            :pk-key="listConfig.pkkey"
            :columns="listConfig.columns"
            :row-handle="listConfig.rowHandle"
            :totalKey="listConfig.totalKey"
            :pageKey="listConfig.pageKey"
            :pageSizeKey="listConfig.pageSizeKey"
            :pageCountKey="listConfig.pageCountKey"
            :openPagination="listConfig.openPagination"
            :showPagination="listConfig.showPagination"
            :pagination="listConfig.pagination"
            :loading="listConfig.loading"
            :selectionType="listConfig.selectionType"
            :selectable="listConfig.selectable"
            :broadWidth="listConfig.broadWidth"
            :summary-method="listConfig.getSummaries"
            :header-cell-class-name="headerCellClassName"
            :row-class-name="rowClassName"
            @action-event="handleAction"
            @pagination-change="handlePaginationChange"
            @column-link-click="handleColumnLink"
            @click-index="handleClickIndex"
        ></mars-crud>
    </el-row>
</template>
<script>
import ListModel from './model'
export default {
    name: "",
    data() {
        return {
            listConfig : ListModel.new(this)
        }
    },
    methods: {
        handleAction(command, position, selection, data) {
            // 功能按钮的点击事件
            console.log('handle action', command, position, selection, data)
        },
        handlePaginationChange(page) {
            this.myUtil.setPagination(this.listConfig.pagination, page)
            this.loadData()
        },
        handleColumnLink(data, columns) {
            // 超链接点击
        },
        handleClickIndex(scope, data) {
            // 序号点击事件
        },
        headerCellClassName({row, column, rowIndex, columnIndex}) {
            // header-cell-class-name 属性可以直接填字符穿
        },
        rowClassName({ row, rowIndex }) {
            // 每一行的类名
        },
    },
    created() {},
    mounted() {
        this.listConfig.loadData()
    }
}
</script>
<style lang="scss" scoped>
</style>
